name: A Minor Help
description:
Even your minor gestures can cause a major turn of events in someone else's life. Join the adventure of a little fellow as they jump through the woods while someone takes care of their little bonsai.

Controls:

A/D - Move
Space - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Use hook
W/S - Go up/down while hooked
E - Interact with objects

Developed during #gamejaaj on the course of two weeks.
